blocks.name: sra1r
blocks.content: The multiplicative neutral element of a subring algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm sra1r(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cur, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c2), c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cur, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, cfv(cbs, c2)))
} = {
  eqtrd(c0, cfv(cur, c1), cfv(cur, c2), w0)
  rngidpropd(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, cfv(cbs, c2), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c2), w0)
  srabase(c2, c1, c3, w0)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmulr, c2), cfv(cmulr, c1), w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  sramulr(c2, c1, c3, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sra1r(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 =(1r ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =((subringAlg ` c2)` c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(1r ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ⊆(Base ` c2))
} = {
  eqtrd(c0, (1r ` c1), (1r ` c2), w0)
  rngidpropd(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, (Base ` c2), w0)
  eqidd((Base ` c2), w0)
  srabase(c2, c1, c3, w0)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (× ` c2), (× ` c1), w0, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2)))
  sramulr(c2, c1, c3, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: sraring
blocks.content: Condition for a subring algebra to be a ring. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm sraring(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, crg))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
} = {
  biimpac(wcel(c0, crg), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, crg))
  ringpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c3, c2, wss(c1, c2))
  a1i(wss(c1, c2), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  syl5eq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c0), wss(c1, c2))
  srabase(c0, c3, c1, wss(c1, c2))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), wss(c1, c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  sraaddg(c0, c3, c1, wss(c1, c2))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmulr, c3), wss(c1, c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  sramulr(c0, c3, c1, wss(c1, c2))
  a1i(wss(c1, c2), wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c1)))
  syl6sseq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), c2, wss(c1, c2))
  id(wss(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c1, c2))
  diff.hs1.w(wss(c1, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sraring(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→ c3 ∈ Ring)
  ⊣ c3 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
} = {
  biimpac(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ∈ Ring)
  ringpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c3, c2, c1 ⊆ c2)
  a1i(c1 ⊆ c2, c2 =(Base ` c0))
  syl5eq(c2, (Base ` c3), (Base ` c0), c1 ⊆ c2)
  srabase(c0, c3, c1, c1 ⊆ c2)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (+ ` c0), (+ ` c3), c1 ⊆ c2, (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2))
  sraaddg(c0, c3, c1, c1 ⊆ c2)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (× ` c0), (× ` c3), c1 ⊆ c2, (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2))
  sramulr(c0, c3, c1, c1 ⊆ c2)
  a1i(c1 ⊆ c2, c3 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c1))
  syl6sseq(c1, (Base ` c0), c2, c1 ⊆ c2)
  id(c1 ⊆ c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ⊆ c2)
  diff.hs1.w(c1 ⊆ c2)
}

blocks.name: sradrng
blocks.content: Condition for a subring algebra to be a division ring. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm sradrng(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdr))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdr), wcel(c3, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c3), cdif(cfv(cbs, c3), csn(cfv(c0g, c3)))))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, crg), wcel(c0, crg))
  drngring(c0)
  sraring(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3eqtr3d(cfv(cui, c3), cdif(cfv(cbs, c3), csn(cfv(c0g, c3))), cfv(cui, c0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cui, c0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cui, c0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))), wcel(c0, crg))
  isdrng(c0, cfv(cui, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cui, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  unitpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)))
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmulr, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  sramulr(c0, c3, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)))
  difeq12d(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0)), cfv(cbs, c3), csn(cfv(c0g, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)))
  srabase(c0, c3, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)))
  sneqd(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c0g, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)))
  sralmod0(cfv(c0g, c0), c3, c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c1)))
  eqidd(cfv(c0g, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)))
  syl6sseq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), c2, wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2))
  isdrng(c3, cfv(cui, c3), cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(c0g, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cui, c3))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wss(c1, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sradrng(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→ c3 ∈ DivRing)
  ⊣ c3 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), c3 ∈ DivRing, c3 ∈ Ring, (Unit ` c3)=((Base ` c3)\ {(0 ` c3)}))
  sylan(c0 ∈ DivRing, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ∈ Ring, c0 ∈ Ring)
  drngring(c0)
  sraring(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3eqtr3d((Unit ` c3), ((Base ` c3)\ {(0 ` c3)}), (Unit ` c0), ((Base ` c0)\ {(0 ` c0)}), (c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  adantr(c0 ∈ DivRing, c1 ⊆ c2, (Unit ` c0)=((Base ` c0)\ {(0 ` c0)}))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ DivRing, (Unit ` c0)=((Base ` c0)\ {(0 ` c0)}), c0 ∈ Ring)
  isdrng(c0, (Unit ` c0), (Base ` c0), (0 ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((Unit ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  unitpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c3, (Base ` c0), (c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  eqidd((Base ` c0), (c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (× ` c0), (× ` c3), (c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c0)))
  sramulr(c0, c3, c1, (c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  difeq12d((Base ` c0), {(0 ` c0)}, (Base ` c3), {(0 ` c3)}, (c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  srabase(c0, c3, c1, (c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  sneqd((0 ` c0), (0 ` c3), (c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  sralmod0((0 ` c0), c3, c0, c1, (c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  a1i((c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), c3 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c1))
  eqidd((0 ` c0), (c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  syl6sseq(c1, (Base ` c0), c2, (c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  simpr(c0 ∈ DivRing, c1 ⊆ c2)
  isdrng(c3, (Unit ` c3), (Base ` c3), (0 ` c3))
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  eqid((Unit ` c3))
  eqid((0 ` c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
}

blocks.name: srasubrg
blocks.content: A subring of the original structure is also a subring of the constructed subring algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm srasubrg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c2), c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, cfv(cbs, c2)))
} = {
  eleqtrd(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1), cfv(csubrg, c2), w0)
  subrgpropd(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, cfv(cbs, c2), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c2), w0)
  srabase(c2, c1, c3, w0)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cplusg, c1), w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  sraaddg(c2, c1, c3, w0)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmulr, c2), cfv(cmulr, c1), w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  sramulr(c2, c1, c3, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm srasubrg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =((subringAlg ` c2)` c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(SubRing ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ⊆(Base ` c2))
} = {
  eleqtrd(c0, (SubRing ` c1), (SubRing ` c2), w0)
  subrgpropd(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, (Base ` c2), w0)
  eqidd((Base ` c2), w0)
  srabase(c2, c1, c3, w0)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (+ ` c2), (+ ` c1), w0, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2)))
  sraaddg(c2, c1, c3, w0)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (× ` c2), (× ` c1), w0, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2)))
  sramulr(c2, c1, c3, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: sralvec
blocks.content: Given a sub division ring ` F ` of a division ring ` E ` , ` E ` may be considered as a vector space over ` F ` , which becomes the field of scalars. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-May-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm sralvec(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c0))), wcel(c3, clvec))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, c2))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c0))), wcel(c3, clvec), wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(cfv(csca, c3), cdr))
  syl5eqel(c3, clmod, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c0))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c0)), wcel(cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2), clmod))
  sralmod(c2, c0, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2))
  eqid(cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2))
  eqeltrrd(cfv(csca, c3), cdr, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c0))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c0)), wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c3)))
  syl5eq(c1, cfv(csca, c3), co(c0, cress, c2), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c0)))
  srasca(c0, c2, c3, wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c0)))
  a1i(wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c0)), wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2)))
  subrgss(c2, c0, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c0)))
  islvec(c3, cfv(csca, c3))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sralvec(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c2 ∈(SubRing ` c0))→ c3 ∈ LVec)
  ⊣ c3 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c2)
  ⊣ c1 =(c0[|`s]c2)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c2 ∈(SubRing ` c0)), c3 ∈ LVec, c3 ∈ LMod, (Scalar ` c3)∈ DivRing)
  syl5eqel(c3, clmod, ((subringAlg ` c0)` c2), (c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c2 ∈(SubRing ` c0)))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ DivRing, c1 ∈ DivRing, c2 ∈(SubRing ` c0), ((subringAlg ` c0)` c2)∈ LMod)
  sralmod(c2, c0, ((subringAlg ` c0)` c2))
  eqid(((subringAlg ` c0)` c2))
  eqeltrrd((Scalar ` c3), cdr, c1, (c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c2 ∈(SubRing ` c0)))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ DivRing, c1 ∈ DivRing, c2 ∈(SubRing ` c0), c1 =(Scalar ` c3))
  syl5eq(c1, (Scalar ` c3), (c0[|`s]c2), c2 ∈(SubRing ` c0))
  srasca(c0, c2, c3, c2 ∈(SubRing ` c0))
  a1i(c2 ∈(SubRing ` c0), c3 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c2))
  subrgss(c2, c0, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  simp2(c0 ∈ DivRing, c1 ∈ DivRing, c2 ∈(SubRing ` c0))
  islvec(c3, (Scalar ` c3))
  eqid((Scalar ` c3))
}

blocks.name: srafldlvec
blocks.content: Given a subfield ` F ` of a field ` E ` , ` E ` may be considered as a vector space over ` F ` , which becomes the field of scalars. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-May-2023.)
